content.detailedDescription:
While waiting for the a red light to change, i observed a commercial plane flying in my direction. suddenly there was also another object above it. the object above was shaped as triangle and had three light on each end. my estimate is that the triangular object was about a mile or more above the plane since i could clearly observe each one. the object must have been large since it appeared bigger than the plane. it had solid light and no beacons on it. the plane as well as the object appeared to be traveling at the same speed. 
when the light changed to green, i accelerated and pulled into a nearby gas station. at that time i lost track of the plane and objects due to the trees around the gas station.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object flying above commercial plane

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young child at the time i remember this event happening and i think i may have only been about two or three years old ,but i strongly believe this happened and i have reoccuring memories of the day this happaned.
i can't give the approximate date nor the time and the best i can guess was it was around the time of 1992 or 1993 in williamstan michigan that this happened as i remenber that i was able to talk.
so here's my best description of what  happened to me .
  i  myself was only i guess three years old and being   young i  was asleep and i was woken up remember hearing  police sirens at about 9:30 am in the morning and my mom or someone else came into the room kinda in a panic saying justin, justin wake up!
i was woken up by  this person who obviously was my mom and i was carried outside to where several people were outside with their attention fixed up into the sky.
i  looked up and noticed that further up the road from my house a fairly big sized  object was hovering over the road and there ware  paramedics who were  pulled over and everyone who was around where this object was was terrified of it pointing toward the sky .
the craft from my reoccuring memories that i saw that day was 
 was fairly big and it was the shape of a disc .The sides of it had lined lights on it  and on the bottom there was a hole where there was some kind of propulsion system that admitted a sky blue /neon flame.
going up from the sides of the craft it was like a edged lid shape cocering the bottom up and was pure black.
so my reaction i guess at my age to this object were like mommy what is that ,and i guess she was scared or something as i never remember her giving me a answer but i was set down and my mom walked across the street and this is what i can best remember.
content.summary: Large disk shaped flying craft with spinning lights .

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my balcony to check out the skies because i've been seeing some flickering lights in the sky lately. i noticed some very bright white flickering lights in the northeastern sky, very low above the horizon. after about a minute or so, i started to see what looked like a more constant small white light within the flickering lights. this light seemed to flicker on and off much more slowly than the ones surrounding it. this went on for about 20 seconds or so before all of the lights suddenly went out. 

i continued to watch the skies for a few minutes more when i noticed a small white star/orb-like light approaching from the north. at first i just assumed it was a plane coming from miami international airport which is directly north of me at least 10 miles away. as it got closer i began to realize it couldn't be a plane because it made absolutely no sound, had no other lights on it, blinking,strobing or otherwise and i could not make out it's shape. with a plane you can easily make out it's frame,tail,etc. but i could only see a white orb-like light. i also noticed that as it got closer, the color started to change and darken to a dark yellow.
 
unfortunately it didn't fly directly over me, but just to the side of my building instead so i ran out of my apartment to the landing in the rear of my building to see it come out on the other side. it was still moving south at the same speed and appeared to look even darker in color, almost like it's light was fading. i watched it as long as i could until it disappeared into the rest of the city lights. 

i suspect this light/object either came from the flickering lights i'd seen earlier, or it was the exact same object. it was very similar to something i'd seen about a month ago around 5am as i was walking my dog. i just looked directly up and saw a white star-like light moving very fast in a perfectly straight line and heading east. it flew right over me and again i didn't hear a sound or make out it's frame.
content.summary: White star-like orb

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were taking our to dogs out for a walk when we both looked into the sky and we saw an orange light we watched it for about 7 minutes coming staright at us and over us it looked so odd there were no starboard or port lights it flew over us at about 2000 ft from east to west heading toward teeside once over us there was no noise at all i took a photo and when i have blown it up it looks like a big firey worm bending and twisting i have reported this to the local police ...What else do u do...Both me and my wife were nervous through out and now we feel sick and very anxious

i have the photo on my sony ericcson phone the quality of the pic is alot better

have you seen anything like this before
content.summary: Orange ball light 2000ft 200-300 miles per hour no noise at all

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the backyard of your home when, f18 hornet was doing it's
demo flight for the air show. i had taken about four pictures of the f18.
one picture show small object at the 10 clock position from the f18.
content.summary: Taking picture of f18 at airshow object on picture.

jaime garcia

content.detailedDescription: I have a 180 degrees panoramic view of west harlem in manhattan from where i live. around 11:30pm on august 7th, 2009, i decided to get up from my desk and take a break. the moment i approached my living room window to look to the horizon, i see this greenish/whiteish incandescent fireball flying horizontally above my building in direction north to west harlem above morningside heights. however after two seconds the fireball suddenly--and instantaneously--disappeared without trace. the speed at which it was flying was similar to the speed of a helicopter in cruising mode.
content.summary: Incandescent--almost like a fireball--sphere flying north direction above west harlem

content.detailedDescription: I was in the hammock i seen a small bright light that was simalar to what i presume to be the space station i got up to look because the tree was in the way and looked straight up a little south and seen a black spot with a small light source around it bout 30 feet across and maybe 100 yards up and felt confused then looked again nothing was there includind the small bright light there were stars further south from the where the small light shown through the tree but only about 25% as bright and the light from the small spot the space station is further south but for some reason i didnt notice its light until a week later on a side note july 24 is pioneer day in utah the states birthday and this dark spot was directly west of a mormon temple
content.summary: 100 yds up about 30'across looked like a solar eclipse dark 90% across with luminecence around i felt naturally confused

content.detailedDescription:
I have several pitures on different dates of some kind of vehicle that appears to have some kind energy feild.
thease vehicles are round in shape and sometimes apper in clusters. please contact me so we can discuss this further
content.summary: Round vehicles with energy fields.

content.detailedDescription:
So i'm not too sure what to expect from this but here goes.  i'll preceed this by saying that i had an experience which originally seemed to strictly be a really cool dream that startled me.  i thought this until about 15 minutes ago when i noticed a common factor that is shared with a few other stories told by others on this site.  

i recall having been extremely tired on this evening and going to bed around 9 pm.  i was asleep on my left side with my right arm over my girlfriend as we lay in the "spooning" position.  i know this as fact because i was in this exact same position in my bed, in my apartment, with the same exact surroundings in my dream.  i recall seeing an alien being standing at the foot of my bed.  it was about 5-1/2 to 6 feet tall.  you know, big eyes, grey, all the characteristics that pop culture has taught me to be characteristics of an alien.  the one thing that was different is the one thing that i now find odd.  it was wearing what appeared to be a 3 piece suit.  black.  i find this odd because i had never heard of sightings/encounters having beings wearing suits.  at the time i jsut thought it was some crazy detail my mind made up.  anyway, this thing reached out as if to grab me from the foot of the bed and it scared the living you-know-what out of me and woke me up yelling.  i've never woken up yelling about a dream before.  i truley to enjoy scary dreams, when i get them which is rare, and never wake up yelling.  my girlfirend woke up to my scream and calmed me down.  now from the time i had gone to sleep until this moment when i am now calmed down, it seemed as though i had been asleep for 15-20 minutes max.  when i looked at the clock it was some time around 1 am.  

i do not recall having a dream about aliens prior to, or after this.  

some of you reading this are probably thinking this is absolutely nothing, and that may be the case as these are all the details.  but, the part that just put a big lump in my throat is that it was wearing a 3 piece suit.  like i said, i've never heard any story about an alien wearing a suit.  and if i was dreaming, why, if i've never heard of this, would this thing be wearing a suit.  i found this site about a week ago and am completely enamoured with it.  now having read others encounters on this site, it's making me wonder since a few of them report seing beings wearing suits.  

i may have left out a detail or two because i tried to submit the form previously but didn't fill it out all the way and had to type all of this over again.  

if you know of a similar experience and can shed some light on this, please do let me know.
content.summary: Not too sure.......

content.detailedDescription:
Cluster of 6-7 lights (small but bright dots) appeared stationary for about 20 seconds.  looking south about 170 degrees and an elevation of about 50 degrees from my backyard near the intersection of mcqueen/elliot.  the cluster was about the size of my fist at arms length and seemed to be very high in altitude.  the sky was mostly clear with a few wispsy clouds.  no air traffic in the immediate area.
  i was in the swimming pool with my grandkids.  we always look up in the sky because there is a fair amount of air traffic because of the proximity to sky harbor airport. i went to get some field glasses and the lights were gone when i returned to the backyard 30 seconds later.
content.summary: Cluster of 6-7 bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
This evening my friends and i went to cheesman park to view "jurassic park."

my fiance went to a poker game instead, so i had put my phone on silent and left it by my side, so i could check if i had any calls.  i checked my phone at 9:48 pm. about 30 seconds later, this extremely fast object shot across the sky. by guesstimate, probably 7-8 bullet shaped orange items all in a row. they almost looked like one object, not individuals - although it moved so fast i couldn't be sure. it just seemed to disappear as quickly as it appeared. it did not fade away. it just vanished.

i was facing north (towards colfax) and the item was far up in the sky, above the television monitor that was set up.  the object moved from east to west.  as it went to the west, it seemed to go higher in the air, as it vanished. 
the entire audience saw it and people were whispering, "did you see that?"  and "what was that?" 

i thought that the bullet shaped items were too structural looking to be a comet, but i could be wrong.

i would be very interested to know if this was a ufo or some naturally explained phenomenon.

thank you,

heather

p.S. i used the term "bullet" because it was in the list of choices on the website. the bullet description seemed to fit the best out of all the choices, but i could be wrong as it was moving so fast, and i did not think to classify it's shape as i was viewing it.
content.summary: Multiple bullet shapes all in a row; orange.

content.detailedDescription: I was approximately 12 years old living on a farm.  my brothers and sister all slept in the basement in different rooms.  one night i awoke in a strange room which was approx. 10'x10' with a two windows and "door"  in one wall below which was a metal bench attached to the wall.There were really two windows with the door between them and two benches.  the windows were slanted outward and into a hall way which appeared to be about four or five feet wide.  in the room in which i found myself was a man, about 25 to 30 years old sitting on the metal bench with his legs spread and his head bent down looking between his legs at the floor.  the door did not have a handle or means to open the door from what i could see or figure out.  i was walking around the room trying to find some way which to get out of it thinking that i must be sleeping and dreaming as i did so and i would wake soon.  about the time i turned toward the man and was getting ready to ask him why he was just sitting there a being which was so tall its head almost rubbed the ceiling walked past the window.  the being was covered with reddish orange hair  and was not wearing anything else.  i was so afraid that i almost got sick however i though that if i was afaid maybe i could "attack" or at least appear to be dangerous so that the being would not come into the room.  i jumped onto the bench then stepped onto the ledge in which the window was inset and started growling, scratching & pounding on the glass in an effort to show the being how "dangerous" i was.  all the time while i was doing this the man in the room with me never moved or made a sound.  the being walking past the window without even turning to look at me and i was so happy.  i got down off the window frame and sat down on the bench.  i do not recall anything after that point until i awoke in my bed at about 5 am when it was time to get up and do the morning chores.   i do not know who the man was, i had never seen him before nor did i ever recall seeing him again.  i do not recall being taken to the craft nor returned from the craft to home.  i do recall that i was wearing only my underpants, my normal sleeping wear while the man was wearing jeans and a plaid shirt.
content.summary: "woke up in a holding cell aboard ship"

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the sunset reflected on the clouds in the eastern sky. when i downloaded the pictures, i noticed this ball and other possible similar shapes in the picture. i have watched the sky in sucessive nights and seen what appear to be round objects blinking on and off as they change direction and move around in the clouds.  cannot see them as they move, only when they blink.
content.summary: Round silver ball in  storm clouds

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30p.M.I was sitting in my back yard looking south when i noticed 3 bright white lights moving slowley to the south. at first i thought it was a plane either taking off or landing at hobby airport which is app.10to15 miles from my location.But as i watched, the lights began to pulse in unison and then started to strob or a ripple like effect like a police car. it was no airplane because there were no navigation lights on what would be the wings or fusalage. all the while the 3 bright light's nevermoved like they were part of a solid object.It looked like a rectangle from my vantage point.I noticed the object turn more to the south south east.All the while the light's never stopped pulsating and strobbing.The object moved slowley because i watched it for about 3 min. before disappearing behind my neighbor's roof line.I am curiouse if anyone else noticed it.I do not think it was a plane, at least a conventional plane, because of the lack of navigationl (green and red)light's.I can draw it or be willing to talk about it with someone.I've had several sighting's over my 52 yrs. of life so i wasn't scared just really curious. you can contact me by phone or e-mail if you like. this happened wendsday night 8-5-09.
content.summary: 3 bright white light's evenly spaced pulsating then strobbing or ripple effect

content.detailedDescription:
I was in san francisco on twin peaks looking over the east bay area it was around 9-9:30 pm although the camera clock was set wrong the date was correct it was oct 8th 1998. suddenly out of no where this star like fire ball appeared in the sky. it flew in circles and around the sky in various directions but no one new what it was. i have never seen anything like this before or since. at first i was scarred then i just wanted to get it all on film then i started asking people questions but no one really new what it was.
i am from n.H. and have had several ufo sightings and of holy beings but i never had a camera until this time. i did not report this before now for no real reason i just kept it and would show it to friends now and then. no one has explained it yet. what do you think?
i have many stories to tell about sightings with family and friends alike and also some i have had alone. i even have a memory from childhood being taken away. i never thought it really mattered if anyone really new or believed but i know from what i have seen there are most defiantly others with abilities higher than my own at this time.
although this may be true for most human beings there are some holy beings who are in human form and have abilities beyond your imagination.
i am a buddhist monk and have met some of these holy beings and i still am communicating with them today. i have always known one day a holy one would show me the way so i too can attain their abilities. 
whether this video can be explained or not would be irrelevant because there has been so much more that none who have witnessed with me can explain. i think you will explain my video with no problem.
but some unexplained phenomena is truly from the holy realm.

best regards 
from a buddhist monk
content.summary: Star like fire ball flying in circiules

content.detailedDescription:
Odd orb sighting by slushpup

i am an amateur canadian ufologist and a moderator on a web site called disclose.Tv at http://disclose.Tv/
and i deal with sightings and reports all the time. this time i got to see an event for myself.
http://slushpup62.Blogspot.Com/

at around 2:00 p.M. today, my son and i were in my car going to a small town near by called deseronto. we were about 2 miles away approaching north towards the bridge that goes over the bay of quinte. (large body of water attached to lake ontario)

directly over the bay was an object flying east just at cloud level. it was moving very quickly. it was a bright round ball with a thin long black line behind it. the tail was straight as an arrow, with no fins or rudders, almost like a pole sticking out behind it. i figure it was traveling near speeds of 500 mph or more.
within seconds of us seeing it, the object simply vanished after flying easterly for about 10 to 15 seconds. the sky was very clear with scattered puffy clouds. nothing to hide it from sight.
i was driving and i also never had my camera with me. included is an example that i rendered of the event. this is about 90% close to what we saw. in deseronto i will add is a small craft airport and this was not any cessna or hang glider/ultralight nor helicopter. i ever have seen before. it was way to quick. i kick my ass for not having my camera with us. things you see when you don't have it. live and learn.

remember this is just a rendering, not actual picture. i tried to duplicate weather conditions and craft to the best of my ability.

i thought i would share this with you. any thoughts?
content.summary: Strange orb with long black tail

content.detailedDescription:
I am in the process of building a large radio controlled airplane so i
decided to look for a dry lake bed to fly it off of.  a friend from
randsburg suggested i try cuddeback dry lake bed as it's only about 25
miles away.

after driving 7 miles of dirt road ( off of highway 395 )i finally
came to the dry lake bed. as i started to get out of my truck, something
caught my eye. i looked up and saw an all white unmanned aircraft flying
right above my truck and only about 200 feet high.  it looked like a
global hawk.  i grabbed my camera but it was too late to get a picture of it.  since i had my camera out, i decided to take some pictures of the
lake bed and surrounding mountains.  i took a total of 5 pictures in about a 2 minute period.

that evening when i got home, i downloaded the pictures and sent them to
some of my friends. then, later that night, i was reviewing one of the
pictures and was startled at what i saw.  i looked in the blue sky in the
upper right corner of the picture and saw what looked like the moon.
the problem was that the moon should not be in that location of the sky.
so, i zoomed in on the object and couldn't believe what i saw.  it's
some sort of large circle with another circle inside of it. it almost
looks like a petroglyph.  then, i looked at another picture and it has the same object but in a different location and farther away.
if i were to go back to the lake bed with these pictures, i could easily
see where these objects were taken. the pictures are great and have
many mountains etc. for reference points.  a good expert could easily
tell the distance and heights of these objects.

what bothers me is that i am 57 years old and have never seen a ufo
or unmanned aircraft but on this day i see both in only a 2 minute period.
a ufo, an unmanned aircraft and a miltary base just a few miles away.
scary!  you have to see these 2 pictures!  they are no joke and look awsome!  everyone who has seen them are baffled.

after looking at your website, i don't know how to attach pictures but
if you give me an e-mail address, i can send them.
content.summary: Saw unmanned aircraft then saw white circular ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa:  august 6, 2009 at 3:54 am. 
i had been asleep on my couch in the livingroom since we've seen so many ufos from that room, which is surrounded on 3 sides by mostly windows.  we live in a quiet, heavily wooded rural area, with not many houses, in a bowl-shaped valley near the top of a really high hill (or small mountain).  my sister and niece from colorado were at my vacation place at the river.
since the first night here last thursday night when my niece witnessed an orange-ish/red ball of light whiz past the window, she doesn't want to stay here anymore. i admit, i was home ufo hunting that night since being called by a guy in irwin, pa who's filmed a replicating star-like
ufo dropping orbs on several nights. http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=bzbgbfjmkyy
he saw it again this night.  i also saw a moving star-like"dot" about 30 degrees on the east side of my house on the 3rd around 11 pm, that responded to my laser pointer by increasing in size from a dot to the size of a nickel at arm's length in a split second!  i should've started filming before doing so, because after i started filming, it didn't respond to it again and continued traveling south, fading out.  also 'busted' the ufos pretending to be planes--finally caught them doing something weird--a white orb shot into one--caught on film, will post that also on youtube today hopefully. a blow up from that one revealed non-plane structures too. 

anyway, back to the story.  i had only been asleep for about 2 hours.  i awoke to a high-pitched "heeeeeeee" sound (not very loud, but i'm a light sleeper) and looked out the front window to see a craft with flashing lights not far above the treeline on the other side of the valley.  the valley is approximately 500 feet to highest trees. it was travelling from east to west. even though i didn't have my glasses on, i grabbed the hdr-xr500 sony camcorder off the coffee table and ran to the patio door and opened it.  the screen door was also closed and i did a face plant right into it, ripping the screen!  started filming from the deck in same spot as my other videos.  never heard a sound from the other ufos and wondered what this was.  since i've filmed several other triangle type ufos around here, i figured i'll find out when i blow up some stills from the hd video, which is posted on my youtube channel: 
seeingufospa
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=9su3nh1t3gc
i've uploaded some stills here.
there is a structure under the red light and a pole-type structure holding the upper white light that
defies a conventional craft explanation. also, since it was travelling to the right, a green right
side navigation light should have been visible. the right side white light has a small red ball light
on it instead.  i also just heard from someone in toledo, ohio who said they saw the exact same thing at around 1:30 am this morning (august 7th). by altoona, pa also--80 miles east of here.

the cat had been next to me on couch but ran downstairs and hid for the rest of the night.
it usually likes to go outside to hunt, but has been wanting to stay inside and sleep downstairs
lately.  i find it unusual for a 7 year old cat to change her habits like that.  thunderstorms were
the only things that would scare her into hiding downstairs before.
nothing was turned on previous to the sighting so nothing strange detected there.
the camcorder worked, obviously, except for some autofocus & manual focus problems
when first filming (cut those out of video).  the video would have been longer if not for those.
the 'heeeeee' sound on video is almost like cicadas sound and sounds different than what my ears heard. 

you guys on the star team should bring some high tech equipment here and camp out while this area is still hot with sightings. a 24-hour watch--especially at night, should bring you some good sightings of your own within a week. weekdays seem to be best.  never any sightings to speak of on the weekend nights, usually.  you can "bust" the fake plane ufos here--but hey, they might be in your neighborhood too.
content.summary: Murrysville:  another weird triangle with flashing lights at 3:54 am

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the country side of toledo, ohio and my friends and i were on our way home for the night at 1:15 am on august 7, 2009. we were driving east on st. route 579 and we were actually talking about ufos and aliens. we saw some bright lights in the sky off in the distance straight ahead of us. we didn't think too much of it but we kept an eye on it since we were already watching the skies. we began to notice this object was coming straight at us, and it was very large. there were two visible white lights to the left and right sides of the craft, and one light in the middle and higher up, making a triangle. it was flying very low to the ground, we are guessing 500-700 feet in the air. we turned left onto reiman road and the craft was still coming straight at us since the road curved back to the same direction we were heading. i stopped the car and opened up my sunroof while my friends michael and aaron stuck their heads out the window to get a better look. the craft was very large and was triangular shaped and was moving at a steady course at approximately 75 mph. it was completely silent. it flew directly over us. we tried to get it on camera or video with our phones but we were in complete awe. we couldn't take our eyes off it to even handle our phones. it looked similar to a stealth bomber at first, but it was much larger and flying way too low and silently and slow to be one of those because i've seen those before and trust me this was nothing from this world. as it passed over us we then saw a glowing red light that was pulsing. aaron suggested maybe it was a plane because of the light, however, there was no white blinking light that most planes have on their wings. it looked like it began to pick up speed and the road we were on turned left. we were then traveling north as the craft was to the left of us traveling west. we were keeping up with it but after about thirty seconds we lost sight of it in the distance as we came up to some trees. we didn't see it again. michael went home and researched recent sightings and found a link posted on youtube of a ufo that looked exactly like the one we encountered. it was seen on the morning of august 4, 2009 just east of here outside of pittsburgh, pennsylvania. we know what we saw, and that video on youtube looks exactly like what we saw, except we had an even better look since it went right over us.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=9su3nh1t3gc&feature=channel_page

this is exactly the kind of craft we witnessed.
content.summary: Triangular ufo flying low and silently over northwest ohio countryside.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading west on i/12 just going past the northshore blvd/airport rd. exit in slidell at 3:00 am (pitch black at this time with some clouds in area) when i noticed a red light off to my south.  i began watching this light as it wasn't flying very high above the trees (maybe around 3,000 feet) but due to the lack of light i could never make out a shape to this vehicle.  as i continued driving west on i-12, this red light continued flying its same direction and when it flew far enough in front of me i could then make out 2 midsized red lights (not small strobing lights like you would find under a commerical plane).  the 2 red lights were flashing separately of each other but were flashing/pulsing very fast.  as i approached the lacombe/st. tammany exit (between 3 to 4 miles away from where i first noticed it) this vehicle changed it's course and began to head west-northwest and flew directly over i-12.  as i was about 2 or 3 blocks in back of it as it veered over i-12 at the lacombe exit i then could make out 4 small white strobing lights in between the larger 2 red fast pulsing lights.  i still could not make out a shape to this vehicle, i could not hear any noise coming from it either.

about 2 to 3 blocks in front of me on i-12 heading west at 3am were 4 cars (they weren't bottle necking each other and had room to pass the other cars).  these cars had just gone past the lacombe exit (as i watched these fast pulsing lights directly in front of me) as this vehicle flew directly over the cars; when this happened 2 of the cars did hit their brakes so i can only think that they were startled to see something going over them.  never at any time could i make out a shape to this flying object.

now i live in the flight paths to both armstrong international and the new orleans municipal airports and i see planes heading to both airports everyday/night.  i walk my dogs every night and can see planes coming for miles.  never once have i ever seen a plane with these types of lights but i could certainly be wrong.  i am hoping that someone else may be able to clarify this incident if they saw it. i am sure that this object did not take off from the small slidell municipal airport as it would've had to fly in front of me before i began to witness it to my south.  neither do i believe it was heading back to that airport as it was heading in the direction of abita springs/covington when i last saw the lights through the tall pine trees.
content.summary: 2 midsized red flashing lights with 4 white strobing lights in between.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading west on i/12 just going past the northshore blvd/airport rd. exit in slidell at 3:00 am (pitch black at this time with some clouds in area) when i noticed a red light off to my south.  i began watching this light as it wasn't flying very high above the trees (maybe around 3,000 feet) but due to the lack of light i could never make out a shape to this vehicle.  as i continued driving west on i-12, this red light continued flying its same direction and when it flew far enough in front of me i could then make out 2 midsized red lights (not small strobing lights like you would find under a commerical plane).  the 2 red lights were flashing separately of each other but were flashing/pulsing very fast.  as i approached the lacombe/st. tammany exit (between 3 to 4 miles away from where i first noticed it) this vehicle changed it's course and began to head west-northwest and flew directly over i-12.  as i was about 2 or 3 blocks in back of it as it veered over i-12 at the lacombe exit i then could make out 4 small white strobing lights in between the larger 2 red fast pulsing lights.  i still could not make out a shape to this vehicle, i could not hear any noise coming from it either.

about 2 to 3 blocks in front of me on i-12 heading west at 3am were 4 cars (they weren't bottle necking each other and had room to pass the other cars).  these cars had just gone past the lacombe exit (as i watched these fast pulsing lights directly in front of me) as this vehicle flew directly over the cars; when this happened 2 of the cars did hit their brakes so i can only think that they were startled to see something going over them.  never at any time could i make out a shape to this flying object.

now i live in the flight paths to both armstrong international and the new orleans municipal airports and i see planes heading to both airports everyday/night.  i walk my dogs every night and can see planes coming for miles.  never once have i ever seen a plane with these types of lights but i could certainly be wrong.  i am hoping that someone else may be able to clarify this incident if they saw it. i am sure that this object did not take off from the small slidell municipal airport as it would've had to fly in front of me before i began to witness it to my south.  neither do i believe it was heading back to that airport as it was heading in the direction of abita springs/covington when i last saw the lights through the tall pine trees.
content.summary: 2 midsized red flashing lights with 4 white strobing lights in between.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were headed up to lake tahoe from reno through carson city.  i had the pleasure of being the passenger for a change.  we were driving through washoe valley when i looked up to the clouds and saw a white cylinder object flying straight north to south very fast.  i saw no tail part, no wings nor shadows of wings or reflections.  just white.  then it went off into the distance into a cloud.  over 30 minutes i saw three of these things, identical, featureless and flying in the same direction through the clouds.  the clouds were fairly thick so i have no idea if there were more of them.  that's it folks!
content.summary: White cylinders flying through storm clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Earlier tonight around 10:20pm i was taking my dog out and was looking around my backyard which has a great open view of the sky with not too much light pollution. i noticed a very bright orb looking object in the north that seemed to appear out of nowhere and then it shot up in a diagonal route from bottom right to upper left. it was so incredibly fast i can't even tell you anything more about it. once it got going it just seemed to disappear in the sky. my dad told me it might be a meteor, but from what i have seen of meteor's they fall at a downward angle and this moved at an upward angle. i didn't notice any effect on my dog when the object was overhead, but again it was so fast i barely had time to truly see it.

later i was inside watching television. from where i was sitting i had a direct view to the backyard. an object was flying through the sky with what appeared to be bright white strobe lights. we have many airplanes/helicopters (military, commercial and private) that fly around here, so i am very familiar with their light patterns and the colors of their lights. i immediately called the attention of my parents who also saw it. my dad, who has an interest in airplanes looked at it and said it wasn't like any plane he had ever seen before. we took some binoculars to the backyard and watched the object. it was moving north/northwest towards the city of rancho cucamonga/ontario and was approx. 3 degrees above the horizon. 

when looking at it through the binoculars we could see that the only color lights the object had were bright white. the lights flashed in a strobe light manner and the pattern appeared to be one or two lights, three lights and then nothing. when the lights stopped, no object could be seen. i was unable to see a shape of what the object may have looked like, unfortunately. i continued to ask my dad what he thought it might be and he couldn't figure it out either.
content.summary: The object was blinking like a strobe light with a pattern of approx. one light then three

content.detailedDescription:
27 aug 08

   i was leaving work around 12:25 pm, 27 aug 08, ellington fld, houston, tx-- i was going home to evacuating from hurricane gustav.

   i notice this object, as i was at the top of i-45 over pass going south towards pearland, tx.  i slowed down to get a closer looked at this object- it was suspended 12��� to 14��� above dixie farm rd.  i looked for cables or something that it could be hanging from, but nothing, it was stationary in sky on its own.  i drove under it and kept going.  i looked in my rear view mirror and it was still there, i know, i was not the only person that saw this object. the sky was clear ������blue bird day���, something came over me- (traumatized), i carry a camera with me all the time, which i use with my job.  it���s funny; i never thought about stopping and calling 911 or take a photo of the object. 
   when, i first saw this object, it looked like a surveillance probe; cylinder with dark windows around the top, the object was 3 to 4 feet in length, approx 10 inches in diameter.    the object was stationary in a vertical stance and never moved-no noise- i heard about ufo probes before, when i got home i told my wife about what i had saw.   the sky was so clear it would have made a great clear photo or movie��� i called my brother-n-law and told him what i had seen.   he said he saw something like this on discovery channel... that the fbi and cia...My have.
   this photo is the area where the probe was seen and the photo of the probe is one that i made on photo-shop to show what i had seen.  this is not the original photo of the probe���but is of the location and what the probe looked liked. i���m an aircraft inspector and been around aircraft for forty-two years,twenty-two in air force and twenty with nasa--still working...  i have seen two ufo���s in my life time.  one last year in trinity bay will i was fishing and one over arizona in 1974, from a airline.... both were disk shape.  the one i saw over trinity bay was a glow- orange moving away from me slow an in seconds it disappeared..  one in arizona was dancing all over the desert flood and sped off much the same way, both sightings were in day light.
content.summary: Ufo prob/fbi/cia?

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from my girlfriends house and as i was walking up the avenue something caught my eye. i looked to the northwest sky and saw a flickering green rectangular light. it moved slowly down towards the horizon as it flickered continuosly. then suddenly it stops flickering and speeds up. as it speeds up it grows in length, then suddenly it dissapears into the sky. it stayed neon-green throughout the whole time. at first i thought it was that effect that occurs when you look directly at a light then elsewhere but this was not the case because the light was vivid, had a definate shape and did not change color.
content.summary: Green streak of light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
This is almost identical to what the three navy vets from floyd county, virginia saw.

i was out walking the dog, looking skyward, and spotted what i thought to be a satellite passing overhead, not unusual, i thought. it was moving straight from south to north until it reached approx. 45 degrees of the horizon. at that point, it made an abrupt u-turn and came back a short distance alongside it's original track. i became very excited, naturally, and was thinking "this is it and it cannot be explained away". the object appeared to make some short moves to the northwest and southeast, then either stopped or disappeared. if it stopped, i couldn't discern it from the stars. i was very excited, my wife was on the porch but wasn't able to see due to lights and i couldn't get her to join me in the yard. at that time, i reported it to brian vike, where i have reported other objects similar to those posted on mufon this year. i regularly watch for the iss and shuttle, and also spot satellites and cosmos or other rocket bodies. as far as i know, satellites and space junk do not make abrupt u-turns.
content.summary: Satellite made a u-turn, then either stopped or disappeared. same as the three navy vets reported from floyd county, virginia.

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba fotografiando nubes con mi camara digital y mas tarde me di cuenta de que en una de esas fotos se pod���a observar como un disco desplazandose en una nube de tormenta. mi avistamiento fue posterior a lo ocurrido, por que solo not��� el objeto ya obtenida la foto con el zoom digital de la c���mara.
aparentemente se parece como un disco que se precipita diagonalmente sobre una nube del tipo cumulonimbus, y se puede observar como un rastro o halo de vapor que va dejando atr���s. no reconozco que sea un ave o alg���n tipo de avi���n.
la c���mara digital con la que se tom��� la fotografia era nueva. no hay en la region ning���n tipo de aviones tipo jets o a reacci���n.


coordenadas geograficas donde se obtuvo la fotografia:
latitud  27���21'13.94"s 
longitud   55���53'49.42"o
el objeto fue visto en la direcci���n norte. 

especificaciones de la c���mara: olympus x-775


el suceso fue ocurrido en la ciudad de posadas (capital), provincia de misiones, argentina

pd. espero que tengan en cuenta la informaci���n dada y que me notifiquen los resultados
content.summary: Rare object moving near a storm cloud

content.detailedDescription: 4th of july, lower mannhatten n.Y.C. about 7pm took a bunch of pictures,two hours before the fireworks and seen some odd shapes of saucer/disc one high and another very low. i took many frames of the same angle,i dont think it is reflection,because the others dont have a saucer shape in them, and in the higher frame photo there is an object miles up that has a saucer shape,the picture of the object that is the lower in the frame seems to have more height then a street light that is included in the picture,once again i have multiple photos in the same angles,but only two have objects in them.
content.summary: Just took two pictures of something?

content.detailedDescription:
I had gotten out of catechism class at st. luke's in westport, and everyone else had gone home, while i waited for my parents to pick me up.

they were late, and being bored, and an amateur astronomer, i decided to do some naked eye astronomy.  while i was looking up, a diamond shaped array of lights appeared over the steeple and slowly flew overhead.

the configuration was a white light in the nose, a while light in the tail, and two red lights, one on the left, and one on the right.

as it flew overhead, it seemed to be only a few hundred feet up at most. the dark area between the lights occluded the stars as it passed.  there was no engine noise or any noise at all, it was perfectly silent.

i kept watch on the object as it crossed the parking lot, and at one point i could see far above a passing passenger jet, with its white, green and red running lights and its engine noise; which was quite a contrast to the ufo's silence and unorthodox running light configuration.

eventually the object disappeared behind the trees on the other side of the parking lot.

the whole passage of time was short, a minute, maybe two. the object was not moving very fast.

i've been an amateur astronomer for years, and have engaged in telescopic and naked-eye astronomy.  i'm also an airplane spotter, and am quite familiar with most aircraft; and their lighting configuration.

this object was not like any aircraft i have ever seen. it was not a simple light in the sky, a meteor, planet, or balloon. it was a solid object that occluded the stars with its dark body.

i've never reported this sighting to any ufo agency before, and only mentioned it to close friends for fear of ridicule.  after hearing stanton friedman on coast to coast last night mention that few of the people who admit to seeing ufos actually reported them, i decided that it was time to make a change.

the only other object i've seen that behaved strangely could have been a meteor (though it didn't behave like any meteor); but this sighting was definitely of some sort of craft and worthy of reporting.
content.summary: Diamond shaped shadow and lights flew overhead at night
